column5: Sorry Gang due to warm weather the derby is now canceled for Feb 19th 2011
oh well will have to wait for the cats to come in

Wont be long for the big cats ...Derby is off for this weekend but ice fishing will still be open there is 14" of ice and I dont see that its going anywere fast ...the Ice Breaker can only go in the mouth of the river ...my thoughts are with the run off fish are going to turn on ....
if there is 14" why not still hold the derby in the river?
Yea..  14 inches is plenty of ice..  Even if there is a little slush..
Just got off the Ice seems to be 8 to 10" forsure lost ice but going very cold tonight ....reason for Cancle Coast Gaurd and GRCA ...never again will I listen to them ..
Could have postponed it Steve.. its mad freezing outside.. ah well.. there is always the cat derby come spring..
